::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer shruggs. "Single reason's as good as double reason if ya 
ask me."

He frowns. "How in the pit would the Predacon council on Cybertron 
know anything about the Alliance?"

He was a bit confused by this. The Alliance had been started on the 
planet, by a Vok that was controlling Zardus at the time. How would 
the Preds on Cybertron know about it?









--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:

>

he
